## Data Analysis

```{r}
library(readxl)

# Load two sheets (or two files)
sheet1 <- read_excel("file1.xlsx", sheet = 1)
sheet2 <- read_excel("file2.xlsx", sheet = 1)

# Suppose the variable you want to compare is called "score"
t.test(sheet1$score, sheet2$score)

```
